titles: Adenochoiradelogia, or, An anatomick-chirurgical treatise of glandules & strumaes or, Kings-evil-swellings : together with the royal gift of healing, or cure thereof by contact or imposition of hands, performed for above 640 years by our Kings of England continued with their admirable effects, and miraculous events, and concluded with many wonderful examples of cures by their sacred touch / all which are succinctly described by John Browne.
author: Browne, John, 1642-ca. 1700.
publisher: Printed by Tho. Newcomb for Sam. Lowndes,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
